metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7339 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The MP4Atom class in mp4atom.cpp in MP4v2 through 2.0.0 mishandles Entry Number validation for the MP4 Table Property, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (overflow, insufficient memory allocation, and segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted mp4 file.

criterions.comment: mp4v2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
